c:atomType.name: AxisTicksRegularity
c:atomType.c:documentation:
The ticks regularity is used to guarantee that the ticks keep the same regularity from one rendering to the next.
This only applies when the domain has some order among its elements (some minimum and maximum values), and the scale domain is exactly the domain of the data.
For more information, see the following option:

c:atom.name: True
c:atom.c:documentation: The ticks regularity will be kept by preserving last minium value in order to calculate the next tick starting date.

c:atom.name: False
c:atom.c:documentation: The ticks will be rendered following the domain of the data and not taking in account previous tick values.
